translation.en: [man] It was a waking dream,
translation.zh: 这是一场清醒的梦

translation.en: the kind that arrives in the twilight between sleep and the real world.
translation.zh: 是那种徘徊在 睡梦和现实之间的朦胧的梦

translation.en: I sat straight up in bed and said out loud,
translation.zh: 我从床上挺身坐起 大声地说：

translation.en: "I'm going to be President of the United States."
translation.zh: “我要成为美国总统”

translation.en: It does seem to be the hot job everyone aspires to nowadays.
translation.zh: 这似乎是当今很抢手的工作

translation.en: The air of impossibility has been removed.
translation.zh: 已经不是遥不可及的梦想了

translation.en: I had that dream when I was seven years old, Dean Lawrence,
translation.zh: 对 我七岁时就做总统梦了 劳伦斯院长

translation.en: and I've spent my entire life studying the lives of former presidents
translation.zh: 我从小到大都一直在研究 历任总统的生平

translation.en: to identify common experiences and traits
translation.zh: 就为了找出他们之间 有哪些共同经历和品质

translation.en: that led to their inevitable election victories.
translation.zh: 让胜选成为必然的结果

translation.en: Such as?
translation.zh: 能举个例子吗？

translation.en: I only went back as far as Reagan.
translation.zh: 我只追溯到了罗纳德里根

translation.en: As far as I'm concerned, he created the modern presidency,
translation.zh: 因为依我看 是他定义了现代总统

translation.en: the presidency of television and celebrity.
translation.zh: 即电视和名人效应之下的总统

translation.en: People like to think of their presidents as characters they see on TV.
translation.zh: 大家会将总统当作电视人物看待

translation.en: Most never actually see them in real life.
translation.zh: 大多数人都不会见到 现实生活中的总统

translation.en: Reagan and Bush Sr.
translation.zh: 里根和老布什

translation.en: were both presidents of their senior classes in high school.
translation.zh: 在高中时期都是高年级的主席

translation.en: Which, I assume, you are on your way to accomplishing.
translation.zh: 那我猜测这也是你努力的方向

translation.en: I believe I have the election well in hand, yes.
translation.zh: 我相信选举完全在我的掌控之中 没错

translation.en: Interestingly, Reagan, Clinton, and Obama were all born into poverty
translation.zh: 有趣的是 里根、克林顿和奥巴马 都出身贫寒

translation.en: while the Bushes were both highborn.
translation.zh: 而布什父子则是出身名门

translation.en: How do you reconcile that with your master plan?
translation.zh: 你怎么将那一点和你的规划调和呢？

translation.en: Well, I have the good fortune of being born both rich and poor.
translation.zh: 幸运的是 我出身既富贵又贫寒

translation.en: Your family has generational wealth.
translation.zh: 你的家族世世代代累积了大量财富

translation.en: Yes, true, but I’m also the only son of a cocktail waitress
translation.zh: 没错 但我也是酒吧服务员的独生子

translation.en: from the Landing Strip Gentlemen's Club in Laconia, New Hampshire.
translation.zh: 我妈妈在新罕布什尔州拉科尼亚的 降落带男士俱乐部工作

translation.en: -You’re adopted. -Yes.
translation.zh: 你是被收养的 对

translation.en: Why Harvard, Payton?
translation.zh: 为什么选哈佛 佩顿？

translation.en: Harvard's produced more presidents than any other school. Seven.
translation.zh: 哈佛培养了七位总统 是所有学校中最多的

translation.en: Hmm. Well, I appreciate that.
translation.zh: 谢谢你的认同

translation.en: You’re clearly a very well-prepared young man. Polished.
translation.zh: 你显然是有备而来的年轻人 很有教养

translation.en: Thank you, Dean Lawrence.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 劳伦斯院长

translation.en: But I’m not here to see the polish.
translation.zh: 但我不是想看你多么有教养

translation.en: You're concerned about my GPA?
translation.zh: 你更关心我的绩点

translation.en: -Because I've-- -I don’t care about your grades.
translation.zh: -因为我… -我不在意你的成绩

translation.en: I want to know you.
translation.zh: 我想了解你

translation.en: The real you.
translation.zh: 真实的你

translation.en: Have you ever been compelled to go meet your birth mother?
translation.zh: 你有过必须要见你生母的感觉吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: My real mother has always been my greatest champion and closest confidant.
translation.zh: 我真正的母亲一直都是 我最大的拥护者和最亲密的知己

translation.en: When was the last time you cried?
translation.zh: 你上一次哭是什么时候？

translation.en: I cried at the end of It’s a Wonderful Life last Christmas.
translation.zh: 去年圣诞节 看到《风云人物》的结局时 我哭了

translation.en: Everyone cries at the end of that movie.
translation.zh: 所有人看到那部电影的结局都会哭

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 就是啊

translation.en: Did you cry because you were moved
translation.zh: 你哭是因为感动

translation.en: or because you felt like you were supposed to?
translation.zh: 还是因为你觉得你应该要哭？

translation.en: Does it matter?
translation.zh: 这重要吗？

translation.en: You were great.
translation.zh: 你很棒

translation.en: I’ve noticed... every time we have sex,
translation.zh: 我注意到每次我们做爱的时候

translation.en: no matter what I do, you seem to really enjoy it.
translation.zh: 不管我做什么 你都好像很享受

translation.en: I don’t know, I feel like, maybe, sometimes, you’re faking it.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我感觉你有时候也许是装出来的

translation.en: I am.
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: Wh...
translation.zh: 什…

translation.en: I don’t like you pretending. I mean,
translation.zh: 我不想让你伪装 我是说…

translation.en: aren’t we supposed to be generating intimacy?
translation.zh: 我们不应该培养亲密感吗？

translation.en: Sure, but we're also giving you the self-confidence you need
translation.zh: 当然啊 但我们也要给你 你所需要的自信

translation.en: to become the man I know you can be.
translation.zh: 让你成为我知道你可以成为的人

translation.en: I know you watch porn.
translation.zh: 我知道你看黄片

translation.en: Your brain is wired to enjoy sex that's presentational.
translation.zh: 享受表演性的性爱是你大脑的本能

translation.en: -Okay, but I don’t want presentational. -[giggles]
translation.zh: 好 但我不想要表演

translation.en: I want authentic.
translation.zh: 我想要真实的性爱

translation.en: I will do better at appearing more authentic from now on.
translation.zh: 那从现在起 我会演得更真实

translation.en: I don’t want you to appear authentic, I want you to be authentic.
translation.zh: 我不想你演得真实 我想你完全真实

translation.en: I don’t understand. What’s the difference?
translation.zh: 我不明白 有差别吗？

translation.en: I promise to be more real from now on.
translation.zh: 我答应你 从现在起 我会更真实

translation.en: -Where you going? -I have a surf lesson.
translation.zh: -你要去哪儿？ -我有冲浪课

translation.en: We’re going back to Hawaii this Christmas
translation.zh: 今年圣诞我们要回夏威夷

translation.en: and I refuse to let my dad call me Barney and vanquish me to the ankle busters.
translation.zh: 我不能让爸爸叫我冲浪菜鸟 看着我被小浪花击败

translation.en: Let there be one place he doesn’t find me a complete disappointment.
translation.zh: 我至少要有一个方面 不能让他大失所望

translation.en: Hey, he thinks you're great.
translation.zh: 嘿 他觉得你很棒

translation.en: He thinks I’m pretty. And he likes pretty things.
translation.zh: 他觉得我很漂亮 他喜欢漂亮的东西

translation.en: [man] River!
translation.zh: 里弗！

translation.en: -River! -[River] I'm in here.
translation.zh: -里弗！ -我在这儿

translation.en: You traitor. You backstabbing son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 你这个叛徒 你这个在背后捅刀子的混蛋！

translation.en: You know how important this is to me. How dare you run against me?
translation.zh: 你知道这对我多重要！ 你怎么敢和我竞争？

translation.en: -Oh, I know. Listen, calm down-- -No. You calm down. I have the floor now.
translation.zh: 我知道 你听着 冷静点… 不 是你该冷静 发言权在我手上

translation.en: Since when have you wanted to be the president?
translation.zh: 你什么时候突然想当主席了？

translation.en: This wasn’t even your idea, was it?
translation.zh: 这不是你的主意吧？

translation.en: No, it was Astrid's idea.
translation.zh: 不 这是艾丝翠德的主意

translation.en: She said I had to do it if I had a shot of getting into Stanford and...
translation.zh: 她说如果我想要有进斯坦福的机会 我就得竞选 然后…

translation.en: I had to do something to get my parents off my back.
translation.zh: 我得做点什么 好让我爸妈别再看我不顺眼

translation.en: Screw you. Do you not understand you're gonna beat me?
translation.zh: 你去死吧 你难道不明白 你可能会打败我吗？

translation.en: Okay? You're better looking than me.
translation.zh: 你比我帅 对吧？

translation.en: You're more popular, co-captain of the lacrosse team, so--
translation.zh: 你更受欢迎 是长曲棍球队的副队长 所以…

translation.en: You're blowing this thing way out of proportion.
translation.zh: 你反应过激了

translation.en: The moment you win, I'll tell everyone that we had sex and you're living a lie.
translation.zh: 你要是赢了 我就立马告诉全世界 我们做过爱 你活在谎言中

translation.en: So, there's that.
translation.zh: 你好好想想吧

translation.en: -Payton. -I'm warning you,
translation.zh: -佩顿 -我警告你

translation.en: do not screw with my dream. All right? I'm on a singular path. Okay?
translation.zh: 别想毁了我的梦想 好吗？ 我的人生道路只有一条轨道 行吗？

translation.en: You're not gonna get in the way, or I swear to God, I will make you pay.
translation.zh: 你不能挡我的道 不然我发誓 我会让你付出代价的

translation.en: Okay? So don't mess with me, River.
translation.zh: 所以别惹我 里弗！

translation.en: Are we clear?
translation.zh: 听清楚了吗？

translation.en: I've never seen you like this.
translation.zh: 我从来没见过你这副样子

translation.en: I don't recognize this person.
translation.zh: 我认不出你了

translation.en: Well, I don't care, okay? I'm not a box, right?
translation.zh: 我才不在乎呢 我又不是个箱子 对吗？

translation.en: I don't need to have four sides for you to look at and approve of, okay?
translation.zh: 我不需要有四面 供你观看或得到你的认可 行吗？

translation.en: I have-- I have feelings, River.
translation.zh: 我也有感受 里弗

translation.en: These aren't feelings, you're just hysterical.
translation.zh: 这些才不是感受呢 你只是歇斯底里了

translation.en: Well, this is the true me.
translation.zh: 这就是我真实的样子

translation.en: This is who I am. I'm a winner.
translation.zh: 这就是我 我就是个赢家

translation.en: I'mma win at all costs.
translation.zh: 我无论如何都会赢 我知道我的未来会是怎样的

translation.en: I know what my future's gonna be and I know how to get there.
translation.zh: 我无论如何都会赢 我知道我的未来会是怎样的 我也知道如何达到目的地

translation.en: And I will not be stopped.
translation.zh: 没人可以拦着我

translation.en: [woman] We have time for one more question each before closing statements.
translation.zh: 在最后陈述之前 每个人还可以再多答一道问题

translation.en: Payton, Mark Twain's classic novel Huckleberry Finn
translation.zh: 佩顿 马克吐温的经典小说 《费恩历险记》

translation.en: is part of this school's freshman year English curriculum.
translation.zh: 是本校一年级英文课程的一部分

translation.en: Do you believe racial epithets should be removed from Huck Finn
translation.zh: 你认为在向学生教授 《费恩历险记》前

translation.en: before it is taught to students?
translation.zh: 应该删除带有种族歧视的词吗？

translation.en: Well, first of all, thank you, Vicki,
translation.zh: 微琪 首先谢谢你

translation.en: for your years of service as part of our yearbook club,
translation.zh: 多年来一直在年刊俱乐部为我们服务

translation.en: and thank you for what is a very thoughtful and provocative question.
translation.zh: 谢谢你提出这么有深度 且引人深思的问题

translation.en: Now, this question doesn't have an easy answer,
translation.zh: 这不是一道容易回答的问题

translation.en: so all I can give you is an honest answer.
translation.zh: 所以我只能诚实地回答

translation.en: No. We should not be rewriting literary giants like Mark Twain.
translation.zh: 不 我们不应该改写 像马克吐温此等文豪的作品

translation.en: Mark Twain loathed racial inequality, and through the eyes of Huckleberry Finn,
translation.zh: 马克吐温痛恨种族不平等 通过《费恩历险记》的视角

translation.en: he was attempting to shine a light on the...
translation.zh: 他试图让人明白…

translation.en: the heinous, shameful sin of slavery,
translation.zh: 奴隶制度令人发指、耻辱的罪行

translation.en: and the systemic racism that pervaded every aspect of his life
translation.zh: 以及在他成长环境中 渗入他生活各方面的

translation.en: in the environment in which he was raised.
translation.zh: 系统性种族主义

translation.en: But make no mistake, the racism that Mark Twain wrote about
translation.zh: 但不要误会了 马克吐温笔下的种族主义

translation.en: has not been banished to the ash heap of history,
translation.zh: 并没有被埋没在历史的废墟中

translation.en: it's with us in this room today.
translation.zh: 时至今日还在我们身边

translation.en: Right? It's different, to be sure. It's... more subtle.
translation.zh: 对吗？这已经不一样了 确切地说 变得更微妙了

translation.en: But we have a long way to go towards true racial equality in this country,
translation.zh: 但要在这个国家取得真正的种族平等 路漫漫其修远兮

translation.en: and as student body president, I'll ensure every student at this school
translation.zh: 作为学生会主席 我会确保这所学校的每一位学生

translation.en: has an equal opportunity to succeed,
translation.zh: 都有平等的机会去取得成功

translation.en: regardless of their color, creed, national origin,
translation.zh: 无论肤色、信仰、民族血统

translation.en: gender, sexual orientation, genetic information, or disability.
translation.zh: 性别、性取向、基因构成、 是残疾还是健全

translation.en: If you choose to honor me by electing me, I will fight for each and every one of you
translation.zh: 如果你们赏脸投我一票 只要我还有一丝力气

translation.en: so as long as there is strength in me to fight.
translation.zh: 我就会为你们每一个人斗争

translation.en: So, give me your vote, and help me lead this great school into the future.
translation.zh: 投我一票吧 帮助我带领这所伟大的学校走向未来

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢大家

translation.en: [man] River, last question.
translation.zh: 里弗 最后一题

translation.en: Uh, should the school be able to limit
translation.zh: 学校应该限制圣塞巴斯蒂安高中

translation.en: the size of sugary drinks sold at Saint Sebastian?
translation.zh: 售卖的含糖饮料的大小吗？

translation.en: I mean...
translation.zh: 我想说…

translation.en: Yeah? No?
translation.zh: 应该？不应该？

translation.en: Who cares?
translation.zh: 谁在乎呢？

translation.en: No, sorry. I appreciate the question, it's a good question.
translation.zh: 不 对不起 我很感谢你的提问 这是个好问题

translation.en: I think it's important that we make smart decisions about the food we eat.
translation.zh: 我觉得明智地选择食物很重要

translation.en: I just feel like,
translation.zh: 我只是觉得

translation.en: it's hardly the most pressing thing that any of us are dealing with.
translation.zh: 这不太是大家面对的最紧迫的问题

translation.en: -The world is dark, yeah? -[softly] Oh, my.
translation.zh: -世界很黑暗 对吗？ -天哪！

translation.en: And I think teenagers nowadays realize that.
translation.zh: 我觉得现在的青少年也意识到了那点

translation.en: And... I don't know, it kind of feels like the world's ending.
translation.zh: 怎么说呢？ 我觉得好像世界要终结了

translation.en: So, you know, if a 42-ounce Mountain Dew makes you happy, I say go for it.
translation.zh: 所以我觉得要是1.25升的激浪饮料 可以让你开心 那就喝吧

translation.en: I keep thinking that, uh, the only thing we all share together
translation.zh: 我一直都在想 我们唯一的共同点

translation.en: is that we’re all alone.
translation.zh: 就是我们都是孤独的

translation.en: And we take pictures, and we post them,
translation.zh: 我们会拍照、发到网上

translation.en: and we Facebook and Insta and Tweet and Snap and everything and...
translation.zh: 我们会用脸书、Instagram 推特、色拉布各种社交媒体

translation.en: it just makes it worse.
translation.zh: 这只让一切变得更糟

translation.en: [whispers] Ah, man.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: I tried to kill myself last year.
translation.zh: 去年我试图自杀

translation.en: Yeah, I never-- I never told anyone that.
translation.zh: 对 我从没把这事告诉过任何人

translation.en: [chuckles] This is weird, I'm up here, you guys-- Can we--
translation.zh: 这太奇怪了 我在上面 你们…能不能…

translation.en: Can I come down there and talk to you? This is--
translation.zh: 我能不能下来跟你们谈？这…

translation.en: We're friends. We know each other
translation.zh: 我们是朋友 我们都认识

translation.en: -[cheering] -We don't have to do this.
translation.zh: 我们不需要这么做

translation.en: -We can have a serious conversation. -Okay, he's walking.
translation.zh: 我们可以严肃地交谈… 好了 他在走

translation.en: So, it was, uh, like, about a year ago, and...
translation.zh: 所以大概在一年前 那时…

translation.en: I don't know, I was just feeling really depressed.
translation.zh: 我也不知道 我当时觉得特别抑郁

translation.en: Not even depressed, just... just hopeless, because, um...
translation.zh: 也不太算是抑郁 只是感到毫无希望 因为…

translation.en: because I felt so alone. And I, uh...
translation.zh: 我觉得很孤单 然后我…

translation.en: I was afraid I was always gonna feel that way.
translation.zh: 我害怕这种感觉永远都不会消失

translation.en: -He's crying. This is bad, this is bad. -And, so I...
translation.zh: -他在哭 这不妙 -然后我就…

translation.en: I went home after lax practice one day and I was working out at home...
translation.zh: 一天 在长曲棍球训练完后回家后 我在家里锻炼

translation.en: and something made me take a 45-pound plate and, uh...
translation.zh: 我不知怎的就拿起了20公斤的杠铃片

translation.en: I tied it to my ankle
translation.zh: 绑在了脚踝上面

translation.en: and I went out to my pool and I jumped in the deep end.
translation.zh: 我走到泳池边上 跳进了深水区

translation.en: And, for a second, I was really...
translation.zh: 有那么一秒 我真的…

translation.en: I was really ready to die.
translation.zh: 我真的准备好结束生命了

translation.en: And then I, like, realized. I was, like, "River, what did you just do?"
translation.zh: 然后我意识到： “里弗 你刚刚做了什么傻事？”

translation.en: And I panicked and I tried to get the rope off my ankle and I couldn't.
translation.zh: 我很紧张 试图解开脚踝上的绳子 却解不开

translation.en: And I just remember looking up at the surface of the water and thinking,
translation.zh: 我记得我望向水面 然后想：

translation.en: "No one's here, man.
translation.zh: “天哪 这儿没人

translation.en: You're gonna die alone."
translation.zh: 你要独自死去了”

translation.en: And then, um...
translation.zh: 然后

translation.en: next thing I remember I was floating at the surface.
translation.zh: 接下来我只记得我浮在了水面上

translation.en: There's no cool ending to the story,
translation.zh: 这个故事没有酷炫的结局

translation.en: it's just the rope untied itself from the weight.
translation.zh: 就是绳子自己从杠铃片上解开了

translation.en: -I don't know, I never did Boy Scouts. -[all chuckling]
translation.zh: 我不知道 我从来没当过童子军

translation.en: No one was there.
translation.zh: 旁边没人

translation.en: Oh, God, he's sweating like Nixon.
translation.zh: 天哪 他就像尼克松一样冒汗

translation.en: I don't want anyone here at this school to ever feel like that.
translation.zh: 我不想学校的任何人有那样的感受

translation.en: It's really important to me that all of you know
translation.zh: 对我来说 重要的是告诉在座的所有人

translation.en: that your lives have value.
translation.zh: 你们的生命都有价值

translation.en: And that they're important.
translation.zh: 都很重要

translation.en: That you're important.
translation.zh: 你们都很重要

translation.en: That’s all I got to say.
translation.zh: 我想说的就这么多

translation.en: I love this guy.
translation.zh: 我爱死他了

translation.en: [Vicki] Candidates, it's now time for your closing statements.
translation.zh: 二位候选人 你们可以做最后陈述了

translation.en: I’ll pick it up.
translation.zh: 我来捡吧

translation.en: People lie, numbers don't. River's ahead of you ten points post-debate.
translation.zh: 人会说谎 但数字不会 在辩论之后 里弗比你高出十个点

translation.en: And if you dig down the tabs at the polls, he is leading you in looks, charisma,
translation.zh: 具体来看 他领先你的民调指标有外貌、魅力

translation.en: and, most importantly, authenticity.
translation.zh: 最重要的是真实感

translation.en: Basically crushing you in that department.
translation.zh: 他在那一项中把你碾压了

translation.en: Especially after that masterclass he put on during the debate.
translation.zh: 尤其是他在辩论中的表现非常精彩

translation.en: Girls love it when a guy who looks like that cries.
translation.zh: 女人很爱看到那么帅的男人流泪

translation.en: Not blubbery at all, more of a silent, sexy cry.
translation.zh: 不是嚎啕大哭 而是默默、性感的哭泣

translation.en: Okay, fine, why don't all of you just vote for him, then?
translation.zh: 好吧 那你们都投票选他怎么样？

translation.en: Our loyalty is with you, Payton. This is a plane. We're all headed to the same place.
translation.zh: 佩顿 我们的忠心在你身上 我们在同一架飞机上 去同一个地方

translation.en: You're the pilot, James and I are your navigators.
translation.zh: 你是机长 詹姆斯和我是领航员

translation.en: Neither one of us knows how to fly like you can.
translation.zh: 我们都不会驾驶飞机 只有你会

translation.en: We need you to get us to the White House,
translation.zh: 我们需要你带我们去白宫

translation.en: but we wouldn't be doing our job if we weren't being honest with you.
translation.zh: 但如果不对你说实话 那就是不负责任

translation.en: If we don't tell it like it is, we'll all crash.
translation.zh: 如果我们不说出真相 就会机毁人亡

translation.en: Okay, what's my next move?
translation.zh: 所以我下一步该做什么？

translation.en: We need to get you a running mate that softens you up.
translation.zh: 我们要给你 找个让你显得温和的竞选搭档

translation.en: Someone undeniably real.
translation.zh: 一个绝对真实的人

translation.en: I recommend a student from the special ed class.
translation.zh: 我建议去特殊教育班选一个学生

translation.en: I believe the proper modern vernacular for them is "differently abled."
translation.zh: 在当今社会 对他们恰当的称呼是 “不同能力的人”

translation.en: So, you're going for the sympathy vote, am I right?
translation.zh: 所以你要博取同情票 对吗？

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: Well, it's not like we're super good friends.
translation.zh: 我们的关系不是很近

translation.en: Been going to school together for three years,
translation.zh: 我们上同一所学校已经三年了

translation.en: the most you and I have ever said to each other is, "Hello."
translation.zh: 我们最多就是打打招呼而已

translation.en: So, you obviously have some sort of strategy in mind.
translation.zh: 所以你心里显然有什么策略

translation.en: The only strategy I'm interested in
translation.zh: 我唯一感兴趣的策略

translation.en: is being a president for every student at this school.
translation.zh: 就是成为这所学校每一位学生的主席

translation.en: That includes people like you,
translation.zh: 包括你这样的人

translation.en: who traditionally have not been well represented in student government.
translation.zh: 传统上 你们的意见 在学生政府内没被充分体现

translation.en: What exactly does that mean, "people like me"?
translation.zh: “我这样的人”具体是什么意思？

translation.en: C'mon. I mean someone with a disability,
translation.zh: 拜托 我是指残疾人

translation.en: someone who might enjoy sharing the spotlight for once
translation.zh: 你们可能会感到高兴 因为终于成为了焦点

translation.en: and having a hand in shaping the culture at this school.
translation.zh: 并有机会参与塑造学校的文化

translation.en: And "student body vice president" looks pretty good on a college application.
translation.zh: 而且在申请大学时 担任学生会副主席会是一大亮点

translation.en: Oh, how thrilling.
translation.zh: 真是激动人心

translation.en: What, so you are not even gonna consider it?
translation.zh: 怎么？你完全不考虑吗？

translation.en: [man] Eat a fat one!
translation.zh: 见鬼去吧！

translation.en: John McCain tried that. It was a disaster.
translation.zh: 约翰麦凯恩试过这一招 简直就是灾难

translation.en: Your family once hired Pinkertons to bust up union organizers.
translation.zh: 你们家以前请过平克顿侦探 去打击工会组织人

translation.en: You have three lesser Picassos in your housekeeper's room in your home.
translation.zh: 你们家管家的房间里 有三幅小幅的毕加索画作

translation.en: Annie Leibovitz took your family Christmas card photo last year
translation.zh: 去年 安妮莱柏维兹 帮你们拍摄了圣诞贺卡全家福

translation.en: and you have a 4.3 GPA.
translation.zh: 你的绩点是4.3

translation.en: You're untouchable. You need a running mate that can humanize you.
translation.zh: 你是遥不可及的 你需要一个让你更人性化的竞选搭档

translation.en: So, what kind of music do you like?
translation.zh: 你喜欢什么类型的音乐？

translation.en: Britney Spears and Insane Clown Posse.
translation.zh: 小甜甜布兰妮和疯狂小丑团

translation.en: Yeah, me too.
translation.zh: 对 我也是

translation.en: If you had the chance to stand up in front of the whole school,
translation.zh: 如果你有机会站在全校面前

translation.en: and you could say anything you wanted, what would you say?
translation.zh: 你可以畅所欲言 那你会说什么呢？

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: Well, what would you want to get off your chest?
translation.zh: 你有什么话是想一吐为快的？

translation.en: Like, if you could change one thing, what would it be?
translation.zh: 如果你能改变一件事 那会是什么？

translation.en: Everyone should quit being a faker.
translation.zh: 大家都不要再装模作样了！

translation.en: Alice? What do you think?
translation.zh: 爱丽丝？你觉得如何？

translation.en: I love you. Unconditionally.
translation.zh: 我爱你 毫无条件地爱你

translation.en: You are the front man of my favorite rock band,
translation.zh: 你是我最爱摇滚乐队的领头人

translation.en: you are the star of my favorite movie, you are my king of kings.
translation.zh: 你是我最爱电影的明星 你是我的万王之王

translation.en: Nothing is going to stop you from winning this election
translation.zh: 没什么能阻止你在这场选举中胜出

translation.en: and turning this school upside down.
translation.zh: 你还会给学校带来翻天覆地的变化

translation.en: But you've got to listen to your advisors.
translation.zh: 但你得听取顾问的建议

translation.en: [woman] I'm just so happy to be alive.
translation.zh: 我为能活在这世上感到很幸福

translation.en: I love when I can get outside into the sunshine
translation.zh: 能到户外沐浴阳光

translation.en: and smell the ocean, you know?
translation.zh: 闻着海水味的感觉特别美好 你懂吗？

translation.en: -Are you not eating lunch? -[Beethoven's "Für Elise" playing]
translation.zh: 你不吃午饭吗？

translation.en: No. No, with the chemo I don't always have an appetite.
translation.zh: 不吃了 做化疗有时候会让我没胃口

translation.en: My Nana says I have to eat,
translation.zh: 我姥姥说我得吃饭

translation.en: but it's just the medicine I take, it makes everything taste so spicy.
translation.zh: 但我吃的药让我吃什么都觉得很辣

translation.en: I'm so sorry to hear that. I...
translation.zh: 很抱歉听你这么说 我…

translation.en: I cannot imagine what that must be like. High school is hard enough as it is.
translation.zh: 我没办法想象那种感受 高中生活已经够艰难了

translation.en: I just don't look at it that way.
translation.zh: 我不会那么想

translation.en: I think that every day is a gift.
translation.zh: 我觉得每天都是上天的馈赠

translation.en: And every time that I wake up,
translation.zh: 我每次醒来

translation.en: even if I have to get a platelet transfusion from Dr. Sengal,
translation.zh: 即使我得去盛格尔医生那儿 做血小板输注治疗

translation.en: I think to myself,
translation.zh: 我也会对自己说：

translation.en: "A lot of kids around the world don't have the same medical care that I do. So...
translation.zh: “世界上有许多孩子 没法得到我这样的医疗服务 所以…

translation.en: If that's what I have to go through, that's God's plan."
translation.zh: 如果那是我必须经历的事情 那肯定是上帝的计划”

translation.en: I'm looking for a VP candidate, because I'm running for student body president.
translation.zh: 我在找副主席的人选 因为我在竞选学生会主席

translation.en: Yes, I heard. Andrea told me. She's, um... She said you were good at the debate.
translation.zh: 我听说了 安德里亚告诉我了 她… 她说你辩论时的表现很出色

translation.en: She takes notes for me when I can't be at school.
translation.zh: 我没法上学的时候 她负责给我做笔记

translation.en: I wish I could've been there, but...
translation.zh: 我要是当时在场就好了

translation.en: a lot of nice people heard about my chemo
translation.zh: 很多好心人听说了我在做化疗后

translation.en: and they paid for me to go to Disneyland with my Nana,
translation.zh: 就筹钱让我和姥姥一起去迪士尼

translation.en: and we got to skip all the lines and it was so much fun.
translation.zh: 我们还不用排队 玩得很开心

translation.en: Best day ever!
translation.zh: 那是最美好的一天！

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: What are you--? Why are you looking at me like that?
translation.zh: 怎么了？你怎么那样看着我？

translation.en: [stammers] I don't know. I just...
translation.zh: 我不知道 我只是…

translation.en: I really like you, Infinity.
translation.zh: 我真的很喜欢你 英菲妮蒂

translation.en: You're so real.
translation.zh: 你很真实

translation.en: We'd like a table for two, please.
translation.zh: 麻烦要一张两人桌

translation.en: -Sure, do you have a reservation? -Yes. Jackson.
translation.zh: 好的 您预订了吗？ 订了 是杰克森

translation.en: Dusty and Infinity Jackson.
translation.zh: 达思娣和英菲妮蒂杰克森

translation.en: I'm sorry. I don't see a reservation under any of those names.
translation.zh: 不好意思 这两个名字的预订我都没看到

translation.en: Well, that doesn't make any sense. I mean, I know I definitely called.
translation.zh: 那不可能 我真的打了电话过来

translation.en: Sorry. We're fully booked until 9:30.
translation.zh: 对不起 我们在9:30之前的 位子都订满了

translation.en: Would you like to make a reservation for then?
translation.zh: 您想预订那个时段的位子吗？

translation.en: Karen, I want you to meet someone.
translation.zh: 凯伦 我想介绍一个人给你认识

translation.en: Infinity, say hello to Karen.
translation.zh: 英菲妮蒂 跟凯伦打个招呼吧

translation.en: -Hello, Karen. -Hi.
translation.zh: -你好 凯伦 -嗨

translation.en: You were really looking forward to eating here, weren't you, babydoll?
translation.zh: 你是真的很期待来这里吃饭 对吗 宝贝？

translation.en: -Uh-huh. -[both chuckling]
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: Hell, I said, "Let's go to Coco's."
translation.zh: 妈呀 我说： “我们去可可餐厅吃饭吧”

translation.en: I was so excited. I love me some of that Coco's pot pie.
translation.zh: 我特别激动 我可想吃可可那儿的馅饼了

translation.en: No, but you dug in. You said, "I want Olive Garden, Nana."
translation.zh: 可你偏不干 你说： “我想去橄榄园 姥姥”

translation.en: -[chuckling] -I want Olive Garden, Nana. I do.
translation.zh: 我想去橄榄园 姥姥

translation.en: I just got my feeding tube taken out, and my Nana said,
translation.zh: 我的饲管才刚刚拔下 我姥姥说：

translation.en: "Sure, yeah. You want endless breadsticks, let's go for it."
translation.zh: “当然可以 你想要任吃面包条 我们就去吃吧”

translation.en: Why don't you tell Karen about your cancer? Hmm?
translation.zh: 要不跟凯伦说说你患的癌症吧？

translation.en: You're in pain sometimes, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你有时候会很痛苦 对吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry. I couldn't help overhear.
translation.zh: 对不起 我无意中听到了你们的对话

translation.en: Uh, we're ahead of you,
translation.zh: 我们排在你们前面

translation.en: but we'd really like you to have our table.
translation.zh: 但我们很想把位子让给你

translation.en: -Oh, no. No, we couldn't poss-- -[woman] Please, I insist.
translation.zh: -不用 我们不可能… -你一定要接受

translation.en: We'd also like to pay for your meal.
translation.zh: 我们也想请你们吃饭

translation.en: Oh, I...
translation.zh: 噢 我…

translation.en: I don't know what to say. Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么说才好 太谢谢你了

translation.en: [woman] It's our pleasure.
translation.zh: 不客气

translation.en: You really ought to be ashamed of yourself.
translation.zh: 你真是应该觉得羞耻

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 拜

translation.en: It's blinking.
translation.zh: 灯在闪了

translation.en: I can take your buzzer.
translation.zh: 把呼叫器交给我吧

translation.en: [Karen] Right this way.
translation.zh: 这边请

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Enjoy your evening.
translation.zh: 祝你们有个美好的夜晚

translation.en: Thank you. You too.
translation.zh: 谢谢 希望你们也是

translation.en: It's so good.
translation.zh: 太好吃了

translation.en: Jesus H. Christ. It's like Rome.
translation.zh: 我的天哪 这就像古罗马一样

translation.en: I mean, all you can eat, and then a quick trip to the vomitorium.
translation.zh: 想吃什么就随便吃 然后往呕吐室跑一趟

translation.en: Dining out used to be something you earned. Well, like you have. But...
translation.zh: 以前的人可不会平白无故外出吃饭 像你这样就可以 但…

translation.en: Don't eat that fast!
translation.zh: 别吃那么快

translation.en: You're gonna yack it all up like a baby bird. Spit it out.
translation.zh: 你一会儿肯定会像 小雏鸟一样全吐出来的 快吐掉

translation.en: Oh, Christ. Look at that. Jesus.
translation.zh: 我的天哪 你看看 妈啊

translation.en: Don't forget, we have free tickets
translation.zh: 别忘了 我们拿到了免费门票

translation.en: to the Florida Georgia Line concert on Friday night.
translation.zh: 周五晚上可以去看佛乔航线的演唱会

translation.en: We're gonna be sitting right up in front,
translation.zh: 我们会坐在最前排

translation.en: right in the handicap section, right next to the stage.
translation.zh: 在残障人士区域 就在舞台边上

translation.en: -Free tickets. Wow, cool. [chuckles] -Yeah.
translation.zh: 免费门票 哇 很棒啊

translation.en: So, how was school?
translation.zh: 所以你上学上得如何？

translation.en: Okay. Payton asked me to be his vice president.
translation.zh: 还行吧 佩顿让我做他的副主席

translation.en: Who's Payton?
translation.zh: 佩顿是谁？

translation.en: He's a boy who's running for school president and he asked me to--
translation.zh: 他是一个在竞选学生会主席的男生 他让我…

translation.en: Jesus Christ, he's going to get more food.
translation.zh: 天哪 他还要去拿东西吃

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对啊

translation.en: What? He asked you to be what?
translation.zh: 怎么了？他让你做什么？

translation.en: He asked me to be his running mate.
translation.zh: 他让我做他的竞选搭档

translation.en: -Yeah? -I don't really know. I mean, he's rich.
translation.zh: -然后呢？ -我也说不好 他还挺有钱的

translation.en: -He's really cute. -Well, I hope you said yes.
translation.zh: 他长得很帅 那我希望你同意了

translation.en: I said no.
translation.zh: 我没同意

translation.en: Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: [softly] Sad.
translation.zh: 真不幸

translation.en: I felt like he was using me, and I don't like to be used.
translation.zh: 我觉得他是在利用我 我不想被人利用

translation.en: [Dusty sighs] You know what?
translation.zh: 听好了

translation.en: You're gonna finish your endless bread basket right now.
translation.zh: 你现在快把任吃面包篮里的面包吃完

translation.en: And tomorrow, you are gonna march up to that boy and you are going to say,
translation.zh: 明天你就走到那男孩面前说：

translation.en: "Thank you very much. I accept your offer."
translation.zh: “非常感谢 我接受你的提议”

translation.en: Something like this could change your life.
translation.zh: 这种事可能会改变你的命运

translation.en: Do you understand me?
translation.zh: 你明白了吗？

translation.en: You can be vice president.
translation.zh: 你可以当副主席

translation.en: Aim high.
translation.zh: 你得胸怀大志

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: You can get it all.
translation.zh: 你可以得到一切

translation.en: -Hi, Infinity. -[gasps] Hi. Jesus!
translation.zh: -嗨 英菲妮蒂 -嗨 天哪！

translation.en: So, listen, I just was wondering if you had thought any more about my offer.
translation.zh: 听着 我在想 你有没有考虑过我的提议

translation.en: -I've thought about it. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 我考虑过了

translation.en: The answer is no.
translation.zh: 我的回答是 不行

translation.en: -Why? -I don't need to tell you.
translation.zh: -为什么？ -没必要告诉你

translation.en: [woman whispers] Payton!
translation.zh: 佩顿！

translation.en: We have a problem.
translation.zh: 我们遇上问题了

translation.en: [River] That's why I'm proud to announce my running mate,
translation.zh: 因此 我要骄傲地向大家介绍 我的竞选搭档

translation.en: your next student body vice president,
translation.zh: 也就是你们的下一位学生会副主席

translation.en: Skye Leighton.
translation.zh: 思凯雷顿

translation.en: Thank you so much, River.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 里弗

translation.en: And, uh, thank you for giving students at Saint Sebastian
translation.zh: 谢谢你给圣塞巴斯蒂安的学生 一个具有历史意义的机会

translation.en: the historic opportunity to elect a gender non-conforming African-American
translation.zh: 谢谢你给圣塞巴斯蒂安的学生 一个具有历史意义的机会 选出一位非常规性别的非裔美国人 作为他们的副主席

translation.en: to be their vice president.
translation.zh: 选出一位非常规性别的非裔美国人 作为他们的副主席

translation.en: Now, I can't promise that I'm always gonna agree with you.
translation.zh: 是这样 我没法保证 我永远都会认同你们的观点

translation.en: I have a reputation for speaking my mind loudly
translation.zh: 众所周知 当我不认同别人的时候

translation.en: when I disagree with someone,
translation.zh: 我会大声地把想法说出来

translation.en: but I can promise you strength, fortitude, and the passion
translation.zh: 但我可以向你们保证 我有实力、坚韧和激情

translation.en: to make Saint Sebastian an amazing place.
translation.zh: 可以让圣塞巴斯蒂安 成为一个了不起的地方

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: River!
translation.zh: 里弗！

translation.en: Why are you doing this to me? Why did you have to pick Skye Leighton?
translation.zh: 你为什么要这么对我？ 你为什么要选思凯雷顿？

translation.en: Astrid said if I picked her, I'd have my best shot at winning.
translation.zh: 艾丝翠德说选她 会给我最大的胜选几率

translation.en: Why are you listening to her?
translation.zh: 但为什么要听她的？

translation.en: She doesn’t want what's good for you, she wants power.
translation.zh: 她不想要你好 她只想要权力

translation.en: You're the way she's gonna get it. She's Lady Macbeth!
translation.zh: 她要靠你上位 她就是麦克白夫人！

translation.en: -You gotta calm down. -She's jealous of us, can't you see that?
translation.zh: -佩顿 你冷静一点 -你不知道她嫉妒我们吗？

translation.en: That is why she's trying to take this away from me!
translation.zh: 所以她想把这机会从我手上抢走！

translation.en: Why are you hurting me?
translation.zh: 你为什么要伤害我？

translation.en: You-- You have so much pain.
translation.zh: 你太痛苦了

translation.en: You don't need any of this.
translation.zh: 这些东西对你根本没用

translation.en: You're gonna go to college and join the Peace Corps.
translation.zh: 你会上大学、加入和平队

translation.en: This isn't gonna help you.
translation.zh: 这对你没用

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I really did love you.
translation.zh: 我真的爱过你

translation.en: -[gun cocks, fires] -[Payton] No!
translation.zh: 不要！

translation.en: I wanna bag a Shiras moose.
translation.zh: 我想捕获驼鹿

translation.en: I wanna bag a Siberian buffalo.
translation.zh: 我想捕获西伯利亚水牛

translation.en: All right. I wanna bag... Margaret Edmund Meyers.
translation.zh: 好吧 （18个月前） 我想捕获玛格丽特艾德蒙麦耶斯

translation.en: -Maggie Meyers? -Yes, Maggie Meyers.
translation.zh: -麦琪麦耶斯？ -对 麦琪麦耶斯

translation.en: -I already did. -Really?
translation.zh: -我已经抢到手了 -真的吗？

translation.en: -Full bush. -Dude, nice!
translation.zh: -她没剃毛 -哥们 你真厉害！

translation.en: [Payton] Firstly, it's illegal to hunt Siberian bison.
translation.zh: 首先 猎捕西伯利亚野牛是非法的

translation.en: Secondly, when you talk about bagging things,
translation.zh: 第二 人渣才会说猎取女人这种话

translation.en: you sound like douchebags, especially with your mother present.
translation.zh: 第二 人渣才会说猎取女人这种话 更何况你们妈妈还在场

translation.en: You should totally come hunting with us, Payton.
translation.zh: 佩顿 你该和我们一起去打猎

translation.en: Yeah, that way we could accidentally shoot you in the back.
translation.zh: 对 好让我们不小心朝你背后开一枪 （《尼克松回忆录》）

translation.en: -[both laughing] -That's enough!
translation.zh: （《尼克松回忆录》） 别说了！

translation.en: Yo, that's good, Mom.
translation.zh: 哇 很漂亮啊 妈妈

translation.en: It's for a series I'm doing to raise awareness and money
translation.zh: 我在画一系列作品 为了让大众了解叙利亚战债 并募集捐款

translation.en: for the Syrian war debt.
translation.zh: 为了让大众了解叙利亚战债 并募集捐款

translation.en: This is Orhan. He was killed in an airstrike earlier in the year.
translation.zh: 这是奥尔罕 他今年早些时候 死于一场空袭

translation.en: Bummer.
translation.zh: 真惨

translation.en: Are you boys gonna be back for dinner?
translation.zh: 你们会回来吃晚饭吗？

translation.en: No, we have that event in support of eliminating net neutrality.
translation.zh: 不了 我们要去参加 支持消除网络中立性的活动

translation.en: How can you be for eliminating net neutrality?
translation.zh: 你们怎么能支持消除网络中立性呢？

translation.en: This family holds 54 million dollars in telecom stocks.
translation.zh: 我们家拥有价值5400万的 电信公司股份

translation.en: -He doesn’t care, he's barely in the will. -Boys!
translation.zh: 他才不在乎呢 遗产也没他的份！ 你们两个！

translation.en: Why are you always defending him?
translation.zh: 你为什么总是要维护他？

translation.en: Because you're bullies. And you're borderline psychopaths.
translation.zh: 因为你们欺负他啊！ 而且你们和精神病人差不多

translation.en: Of course you're in the will, same as them.
translation.zh: 遗产当然有你份 你和他们一样

translation.en: I saw to that.
translation.zh: 我写了你的名字

translation.en: Don't tell your father.
translation.zh: 别告诉你爸爸

translation.en: You know, I read this study
translation.zh: 知道吗？我读了一篇研究

translation.en: from Columbia.
translation.zh: 是哥伦比亚大学做的

translation.en: It says that it's impossible for a parent
translation.zh: 研究指出 父母不可能

translation.en: to love an adopted child as much as a biological one.
translation.zh: 像爱亲生孩子一样爱收养的孩子

translation.en: Parents are programmed to be drawn to the children that look most like them.
translation.zh: 父母自然会更关注 长得跟他们最像的孩子

translation.en: I would assume it has something to do with protecting bloodlines.
translation.zh: 我猜这跟传宗接代有关

translation.en: Well, I would say that's a flawed study, because I love you the most.
translation.zh: 那我会说这项研究有缺陷 因为我最爱的是你

translation.en: I always have.
translation.zh: 一直都是这样

translation.en: You're just saying that because they grew up to be such jerkwads.
translation.zh: 你这么说只是因为 他们长大后成了混蛋

translation.en: You're not wrong about that.
translation.zh: 你没说错

translation.en: You can't teach kindness.
translation.zh: 善良是教不会的

translation.en: You know? I tried for a long time.
translation.zh: 我尝试了很久

translation.en: Can't do much with small hearts.
translation.zh: 狭隘的心胸几乎无药可救

translation.en: Hard hearts, maybe, but not small ones.
translation.zh: 也许不是狭隘的心胸 而是铁石心肠吧

translation.en: I love them, don't get me wrong, I just...
translation.zh: 我爱他们 你别误会 只是…

translation.en: The love has edges.
translation.zh: 我们的爱是有边际的

translation.en: It doesn't go on and on the way my love for you does.
translation.zh: 不像我对你的爱 是无边无际的

translation.en: And you felt that way about me right away?
translation.zh: 你一看到我就有那种感觉吗？

translation.en: Like you were a part of me.
translation.zh: 你就像我的一部分一样

translation.en: It wasn't a meeting, it was a reunion.
translation.zh: 那不是相遇 而是团圆

translation.en: This funny, dark, Jewish hair. These big Disney eyes. And...
translation.zh: 这头奇怪、深色、犹太人的头发 这双迪士尼人物般的大眼睛

translation.en: You were alone in the world.
translation.zh: 你孤零零的

translation.en: And I suppose I felt that way about myself.
translation.zh: 我猜我自己也有同样的感受

translation.en: Don't ever listen to your brothers about who they say you are
translation.zh: 别管你的哥哥们怎么评价你的身份

translation.en: or what you might do in this world.
translation.zh: 或者说你能有什么作为

translation.en: [singsong] There's my surprise!
translation.zh: 我的惊喜来了！

translation.en: [in English] Can I use your restroom?
translation.zh: 我能用你们家的洗手间吗？

translation.en: Well, yes, of course. Just follow the path up to the main house.
translation.zh: 当然可以 从这边一直走到主屋就是了

translation.en: There's staff.
translation.zh: 里面有员工帮你

translation.en: -You could've at least said hello. -What is he doing here?
translation.zh: 你至少可以打声招呼吧？ 他来这里干什么？

translation.en: He's your new Mandarin tutor.
translation.zh: 他是你新来的中文老师

translation.en: That's River Barkley, he's incredibly popular at school.
translation.zh: 他是里弗巴克利 在学校特别受欢迎

translation.en: So are you.
translation.zh: 你也是

translation.en: Not his kind of popular. And he's dating my arch-nemesis, Astrid Sloan.
translation.zh: 跟他没法比 而且他在跟我的死对头 艾丝翠德斯隆恩约会

translation.en: She called me a fag in second grade. I'm not even gay.
translation.zh: 二年级的时候她叫我死基佬 我又不是同性恋

translation.en: Well, he comes very highly recommended.
translation.zh: 他得到了强烈推荐

translation.en: I suggest you make him like you
translation.zh: 我建议你讨得他的欢心

translation.en: -and have Astrid Sloan be very jealous. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 让艾丝翠德斯隆恩吃醋

translation.en: Fine.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Every single one of these books is an autobiography.
translation.zh: 这里每一本书都是自传

translation.en: Lincoln, Ross Perot, US Grant.
translation.zh: 林肯、罗斯佩罗、尤利西斯格兰特

translation.en: I like to read about how others achieved their greatness
translation.zh: 我喜欢读别人是如何成为伟人的

translation.en: so that I can mimic what worked.
translation.zh: 这样我就能模仿成功的方法了

translation.en: You know, fake it till you make it.
translation.zh: 装着装着就成真的了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: I fake it a lot too.
translation.zh: 我也经常伪装自己

translation.en: People think I'm... all calm.
translation.zh: 大家都觉得我非常冷静

translation.en: I don't know if I really am.
translation.zh: 我不知道这是不是真实的我

translation.en: It's sometimes like I'm...
translation.zh: 有时候我感觉

translation.en: feeling the whole world at once, you know?
translation.zh: 整个世界都向我涌来 你懂吗？

translation.en: Uh, where did you learn Mandarin?
translation.zh: 你的中文是在哪儿学的？

translation.en: My dad works for Goldman, so we lived in Shanghai until I was ten.
translation.zh: 我爸爸在高盛工作 所以我十岁以前一直住在上海

translation.en: -[in English] "Bathroom"? -[chuckles] Do you want to start?
translation.zh: -厕所？ -什么？我们开始吧？

translation.en: -Oh, yeah, sure. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -噢对 好的 -行

translation.en: -[repeats pronunciation] -[mimics softly]
translation.zh: -学习 -学习

translation.en: [in English] Why are you so tense?
translation.zh: 你怎么这么紧张？

translation.en: How do you know I'm tense?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我紧张？

translation.en: I just do.
translation.zh: 我就是知道

translation.en: You don't seem very happy.
translation.zh: 你好像不怎么开心

translation.en: Are you happy?
translation.zh: 你开心吗？

translation.en: I try to be.
translation.zh: 我试着开心

translation.en: I try to be too.
translation.zh: 我也试着开心

translation.en: [voice quavers] I really try.
translation.zh: 我真的尽力了

translation.en: It's so hard to have to try so hard all the time.
translation.zh: 每时每刻都要强装开心 这真的很难

translation.en: Okay, that was weird.
translation.zh: 好了 那太奇怪了

translation.en: Um, how did you get me to be vulnerable like that?
translation.zh: 你怎么能让我变得那么脆弱？

translation.en: I'm never like that. [sniffles]
translation.zh: 我从没那么脆弱过

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 知道吗？

translation.en: It's just kinda a thing I do with people.
translation.zh: 我就是会让别人这样

translation.en: Maybe it was just what you needed.
translation.zh: 也许那正是你需要的

translation.en: What do you need?
translation.zh: 你需要什么？

translation.en: [in English] I don't know what that means.
translation.zh: 我不明白

translation.en: Can I kiss you?
translation.zh: 我可以亲你吗？

translation.en: See you next time?
translation.zh: 下回见？

translation.en: [Payton] Excuse me. Languages?
translation.zh: 打扰了 语言类书籍在哪儿？

translation.en: -[woman] Third stack. -[Payton] Thank you.
translation.zh: -第三个架子 -谢谢

translation.en: I'm gonna dive right in.
translation.zh: 我就不拐弯抹角了

translation.en: I know what's going on between you and River.
translation.zh: 我知道你和里弗之间发生了什么

translation.en: He told me what happened.
translation.zh: 他把发生的事情都告诉我了

translation.en: I was mad at first, but then I admired his honesty.
translation.zh: 我开始很生气 但我很敬佩他的诚实

translation.en: River and I have complete transparency.
translation.zh: 里弗和我之间完全没有秘密

translation.en: I've always known he was fluid. I am too, sorta.
translation.zh: 我一直都知道他是流性恋 我也差不多是这样

translation.en: And if you're the way he deals with that part of himself, that's fine.
translation.zh: 如果你是他 与那一部分自己相处的通道 那就没问题

translation.en: But I want in too.
translation.zh: 但我也想加入

translation.en: Come over to my house after school.
translation.zh: 放学后来我家吧

translation.en: Let’s all get it on.
translation.zh: 我们一起上床吧

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I don't know where the gun came from. Um...
translation.zh: 我不知道枪是哪儿来的

translation.en: He just turned away for a moment
translation.zh: 他就背过去了一下

translation.en: and then he had it in his hand and then he shot himself.
translation.zh: 手上拿了枪 然后就向自己开枪了

translation.en: [officer] Son, look at me.
translation.zh: 孩子 看着我

translation.en: I never heard a sound like that before.
translation.zh: 我以前都没听过那种声音

translation.en: I need you to focus and tell me everything you remember.
translation.zh: 我需要你集中注意力 把你记得的一切都告诉我

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 出什么事了？

translation.en: He killed himself.
translation.zh: 他自杀了

translation.en: He did this because of you.
translation.zh: 他是因为你才这么做的

translation.en: -[officer] Miss? -I have to see him.
translation.zh: -小姐？ -我要见他

translation.en: -Sorry, you can’t-- -I have to see him! I’m his girlfriend.
translation.zh: -抱歉 你不能… -我要见他 我是他女朋友 我得看他一眼 我是他女朋友！

translation.en: I'm his girlfriend!
translation.zh: 我是他女朋友！

translation.en: I should be crying.
translation.zh: 这时候我应该哭的

translation.en: Why aren't I crying?
translation.zh: 我为什么没哭？

translation.en: It's not you.
translation.zh: 因为这不是你

translation.en: They told me when you were born you didn't even cry.
translation.zh: 我听说你连出生的时候都没有哭

translation.en: You just came out and looked at everyone with a furrowed brow.
translation.zh: 你出来了 然后皱着眉头看着大家

translation.en: I’m worried... that I...
translation.zh: 我担心我…

translation.en: that I don't have the same feelings everyone else does.
translation.zh: 我没有其他人会有的感受

translation.en: I think a lot of young people feel that way, especially nowadays.
translation.zh: 我觉得很多年轻人都有这种感觉 特别是现在

translation.en: Your generation got the terrible idea
translation.zh: 你们这一代的人都有一个糟糕的想法

translation.en: that it was best to vomit every thought and feeling all over each other.
translation.zh: 就是最好对彼此吐露 所有的想法和感觉

translation.en: It's a pandemic of overcommunication that's led to an absence of intimacy.
translation.zh: 这是过度交流引发的瘟疫 让人与人之间不再亲密

translation.en: It's more than that for me.
translation.zh: 对于我来说 不仅仅如此

translation.en: What if I'm just wired differently?
translation.zh: 我的构造会不会就是与众不同？

translation.en: I mean, what if I can't feel for anyone else?
translation.zh: 我是说 要是我没有同理心呢？

translation.en: They say that sociopaths can't do that.
translation.zh: 据说反社会的人就没有这种能力

translation.en: What if all I'll ever able to do is pretend to feel?
translation.zh: 要是我能做到的就只是 假装有同理心呢？

translation.en: Does it matter if you can’t tell the difference?
translation.zh: 没法分辨真假又有什么关系呢？

translation.en: I'm sorry about River.
translation.zh: 我为里弗的事感到很难过

translation.en: He was a wonderful boy.
translation.zh: 他是个很出色的男孩

translation.en: [woman] This is gonna sound awful, but I'm just gonna say it.
translation.zh: 这可能很不中听 但我还是说吧

translation.en: Now that River's dead, you're running unopposed.
translation.zh: 既然里弗死了 你就没有竞选对手了

translation.en: -Seriously? -I can't believe you just said that.
translation.zh: -有没有搞错？ -这种话你也说得出口

translation.en: Sorry, but it's my job.
translation.zh: 对不起 但这是我的工作

translation.en: -[Payton sighs] -You know you don't have to do this.
translation.zh: 你知道你可以不做这事

translation.en: I want to.
translation.zh: 我想做

translation.en: [woman] And while they ask that you respect their privacy at this time,
translation.zh: 里弗的家人希望 你们能在这段时间尊重他们的隐私

translation.en: River's family wishes to express their gratitude
translation.zh: 但他们想感谢大家

translation.en: for the outpouring of support they have received in the last few days.
translation.zh: 在过去几天给他们源源不断的支持

translation.en: It's trying times like these
translation.zh: 在这种艰难的时刻

translation.en: where we, as a community, look to our student leaders
translation.zh: 我们作为一个集体 指望有学生领袖

translation.en: for a way to move forward and begin to heal.
translation.zh: 能带领大家找到前行的路 让伤口渐渐愈合

translation.en: Payton?
translation.zh: 佩顿

translation.en: I didn't really get to know River until last year.
translation.zh: 我是从去年开始 才渐渐了解里弗的

translation.en: He was my tutor.
translation.zh: 他是我的补习老师

translation.en: Then he became my friend.
translation.zh: 后来成了我的朋友

translation.en: And then, my opponent.
translation.zh: 然后就成了我的对手

translation.en: We found ourselves running against one another,
translation.zh: 我们成了竞选对手

translation.en: but River never made it feel like a competition.
translation.zh: 但里弗从没让我有竞争的感觉

translation.en: He would always say, "Don’t worry about it, Payton.
translation.zh: 他一直都说： “别担心 佩顿 让强者胜出吧”

translation.en: Let the best man win."
translation.zh: “别担心 佩顿 让强者胜出吧”

translation.en: Now, the best man can't win.
translation.zh: 现在强者却赢不了了

translation.en: Uh, River was very active in the drama department,
translation.zh: 里弗在戏剧系很活跃

translation.en: so I've asked one of his many friends to help me sing a song in his honor.
translation.zh: 所以我请了他众多朋友中的一位 来给我伴奏 以向他致敬

translation.en: ♪ It's coming on Christmas They're cutting down trees ♪
translation.zh: 圣诞近在眼前 人们开始砍树了

translation.en: ♪ Putting up reindeer Singing songs of joy and peace ♪
translation.zh: 挂起了驯鹿 唱着欢乐和平的歌谣

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
translation.zh: 噢 我希望能有一条河

translation.en: ♪ I could skate away on ♪
translation.zh: 可以让我滑冰到远方

translation.en: ♪ But it don't snow here ♪
translation.zh: 但这里不下雪

translation.en: ♪ It stays pretty green ♪
translation.zh: 四季常青

translation.en: ♪ Gonna make a lot of money Then I’m gonna quit this crazy scene ♪
translation.zh: 我会赚很多钱 然后远离这疯狂的一幕

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
translation.zh: 噢 我希望能有一条河

translation.en: ♪ I could skate away on ♪
translation.zh: 可以让我滑冰到远方

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river so long ♪
translation.zh: 噢 我希望能有一条长长的河

translation.en: ♪ I would teach my feet to fly ♪
translation.zh: 我会教会双脚飞翔

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
translation.zh: 噢 我希望能有一条河

translation.en: ♪ I could skate away on ♪
translation.zh: 可以让我滑冰到远方

translation.en: ♪ I made my baby cry ♪
translation.zh: 我让我的宝贝哭泣了

translation.en: ♪ He tried hard to help me You know, he put me at ease ♪
translation.zh: 他曾努力帮我 知道吗？他让我心安

translation.en: ♪ And he loved me so naughty Made me weak in the knees ♪
translation.zh: 他爱如此淘气的我 让我动容得膝盖发软

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
translation.zh: 噢 我希望能有一条河

translation.en: ♪ I could skate away on ♪
translation.zh: 可以让我滑冰到远方

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river so long ♪
translation.zh: 噢 我希望能有一条长长的河

translation.en: ♪ I would teach my feet to fly ♪
translation.zh: 我会教会双脚飞翔

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
translation.zh: 噢 我希望能有一条河

translation.en: ♪ I could skate away on ♪
translation.zh: 可以让我滑冰到远方

translation.en: ♪ I made my baby say goodbye ♪
translation.zh: 我让我的宝贝离开了我

translation.en: ♪ It's coming on Christmas They're cutting down trees ♪
translation.zh: 圣诞近在眼前 人们开始砍树了

translation.en: ♪ They're putting up reindeer And singing songs of joy and peace ♪
translation.zh: 挂起了驯鹿 唱着欢乐和平的歌谣

translation.en: ♪ Oh, I wish I had a river ♪
translation.zh: 噢 我希望能有一条河

translation.en: ♪ I could skate away on ♪
translation.zh: 可以让我滑冰到远方

translation.en: [Payton] River's girlfriend, Astrid, has asked to say a few words.
translation.zh: 里弗的女朋友艾斯翠德想说几句话

translation.en: Thank you, Payton, that was beautiful. I’m sure River would've appreciated it.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 佩顿 歌声很动人 要里弗在 他一定会很感激的

translation.en: You were right when you said the best man can't win.
translation.zh: 你说“强者赢不了”是对的

translation.en: There was only one person in this race up for the job.
translation.zh: 这场竞选中 只有一个人有资格做这份工作

translation.en: And now he's gone.
translation.zh: 现在他走了

translation.en: That is why I've decided to run in River's place.
translation.zh: 所以我决定要代替里弗竞选

translation.en: -My running mate will be Skye Leighton. -[applause]
translation.zh: 我的竞选搭档会是思凯雷顿

translation.en: We will try to be the first all-female ticket in this school's history.
translation.zh: 我们会努力成为学校历史上 第一对由女性组成的候选人

translation.en: If you believed in what River stood for,
translation.zh: 如果你们认同里弗的主张

translation.en: good, because so did I.
translation.zh: 那很好 因为我也认同

translation.en: And if you give me your vote,
translation.zh: 如果你们投我一票

translation.en: then together, we can keep River's memory alive.
translation.zh: 这样我们就能一同 让里弗的记忆永存于世

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You wanted to see me?
translation.zh: 你找我？

translation.en: This came for you.
translation.zh: 这儿有一封你的信

translation.en: Open it.
translation.zh: 打开吧

translation.en: Waitlisted.
translation.zh: 进入了等候名单

translation.en: [sighs] Sweetheart.
translation.zh: 噢 亲爱的

translation.en: A lifetime of focus and planning,
translation.zh: 我一生都心无旁骛、深思长计

translation.en: carefully studying applications obtained on the black market
translation.zh: 仔细研究我从黑市买来的申请书

translation.en: to pinpoint the exact combination of extracurriculars and test scores
translation.zh: 就为了精准地确定 课外活动和考试成绩组合

translation.en: that would optimize my chances at acceptance.
translation.zh: 让我有最佳录取机会

translation.en: Three years on that stupid literary magazine. Model UN.
translation.zh: 我在那破文学杂志和模拟联合国 浪费了三年时间

translation.en: And service-oriented summer camp in Costa Rica.
translation.zh: 我还参加了去哥斯达黎加的 服务夏令营

translation.en: Flippin' Mandarin!
translation.zh: 该死的中文！

translation.en: -They haven't said no. -This is worse. This is worse than no.
translation.zh: 他们也没有拒绝你 这更糟 比被拒还遭

translation.en: This is-- This is, "Let's wait and see if we find anybody better."
translation.zh: 这就是说： “我们看能不能找到更好的人选”

translation.en: This is, "Even if we take you, you're our second choice."
translation.zh: 这就是说 就算我们录取你了 你也是备选

translation.en: Why didn't-- Why didn't they want me?
translation.zh: 他们为什么不想要我？

translation.en: They took those morons.
translation.zh: 他们录取了那两个蠢货

translation.en: Well, your father and I bought their way in.
translation.zh: 他们的名额是你爸爸和我花钱买的

translation.en: You were very clear. You said you wanted to do this properly.
translation.zh: 你很坚定 你说想光明正大地申请

translation.en: No, I can't get in that way. People know it. It stays with you.
translation.zh: 不行 我不能走旁门左道 大家会知道的 这名声会伴你一辈子

translation.en: It's-- It's handing your opponent a negative ad on a platter.
translation.zh: 这就是把自己的污点送给对手

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: Don't litter.
translation.zh: 别乱扔东西

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Waitlisted is not "no" and you're going to get in.
translation.zh: 等候名单不是被拒 你一定能进去的

translation.en: You're the most exceptional human being I've ever met.
translation.zh: 你是我见过的最优秀的人

translation.en: Hold on. You must've gotten your letter today too.
translation.zh: 等等 你今天肯定也收到信了

translation.en: I'm sure that they have an algorithm that demands they take so many women
translation.zh: 他们肯定是根据算法录取的 要求他们收多少名女学生

translation.en: and so many applicants from this group or that.
translation.zh: 和多少名不同群体的学生

translation.en: Yes, I got in.
translation.zh: 对 我进了

translation.en: Alice, please, don't diminish your accomplishments to soothe my ego.
translation.zh: 爱丽丝 请不要为了安慰我的自尊心 故意贬低你的成就

translation.en: You're gonna be valedictorian.
translation.zh: 你会代表毕业生致辞

translation.en: You have a gold medal in fencing from the Junior Olympics.
translation.zh: 你获得了青少年奥运会的击剑金牌

translation.en: You speak six languages.
translation.zh: 你会说六种语言

translation.en: No one deserves to go to Harvard more than you.
translation.zh: 你是最有资格进入哈佛的学生

translation.en: -And I am so happy for you. -[giggles]
translation.zh: 我为你感到很高兴

translation.en: Tonight is about getting you back on your feet 100%,
translation.zh: 今晚的主题是让你重新完全振作起来

translation.en: so you can win this election and make this world a better place.
translation.zh: 这样你就能赢得这场选举 将世界变得更美好

translation.en: Thomas, please go set up your table in the massage room.
translation.zh: 托马斯 请你把按摩室的工作台摆好

translation.en: You'll give Payton a treatment as soon as we're done.
translation.zh: 等我们完事了之后 你就给佩顿做按摩

translation.en: Reiki, cups, and acupuncture.
translation.zh: 灵气疗法、拔罐、针灸

translation.en: -You're too good to be true. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 你美好得不现实

translation.en: I have a plan to help you win.
translation.zh: 我有个能帮你胜选的计划

translation.en: But first, I need to ask you some questions,
translation.zh: 但我得先问几个问题

translation.en: and I need you to answer me honestly, no judgment.
translation.zh: 我需要你诚实地回答我 我不会对你下定论

translation.en: I swear.
translation.zh: 我保证

translation.en: Did you kill River?
translation.zh: 是你杀了里弗吗？

translation.en: I won't judge you or turn you in. I just want to know.
translation.zh: 我不会评判你或举报你 我只是想知道

translation.en: While you didn't anticipate Astrid jumping into the campaign,
translation.zh: 你之前肯定没有预料到 艾斯翠德会投入到竞选中去

translation.en: you might have correctly thought
translation.zh: 你可能会理所当然地想

translation.en: that River dying would be your clearest path to victory.
translation.zh: 里弗死了是你胜选的捷径

translation.en: I didn't kill him.
translation.zh: 我没有杀他

translation.en: We need to break up.
translation.zh: 我们需要分手

translation.en: -You said you wouldn't judge me! -Not really break up.
translation.zh: -你说你不会评判我！ -不是真的分手

translation.en: We need to pretend to break up in order for you to win the election.
translation.zh: 我们需要假装分手 这样你就能在选举中胜出了

translation.en: Right now, you and Astrid are splitting the sympathy vote.
translation.zh: 现在你和艾斯翠德要瓜分同情选票

translation.en: I'm going to confess that I cheated on you.
translation.zh: 我会坦白说我出轨了

translation.en: It'll be a scandal.
translation.zh: 这将成为丑闻

translation.en: You will dump me and everyone will feel sorry for you.
translation.zh: 你要甩了我 然后所有人都会同情你

translation.en: I've cleared with McAfee and James.
translation.zh: 麦卡菲和詹姆斯已经同意了

translation.en: They think it could gain you six to nine points,
translation.zh: 他们说这会帮你赢得六到九个点

translation.en: depending on how magnanimous you are about the whole thing.
translation.zh: 具体多少分取决于 你对整件事有多宽容大度

translation.en: But everyone will hate you.
translation.zh: 但所有人都会恨你

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: This... is what love looks like, Payton.
translation.zh: 佩顿 这就是爱情的模样

translation.en: This is what sacrifice looks like.
translation.zh: 这就是牺牲的模样

translation.en: This is what it takes to change the world.
translation.zh: 这就是改变世界的代价

translation.en: I am your first lady today...
translation.zh: 我今天是你的第一夫人

translation.en: and always.
translation.zh: 永远都是

translation.en: -But there are rules. -Rules?
translation.zh: 但我有几个规矩 规矩？

translation.en: We will break up
translation.zh: 我们会分手

translation.en: long enough for you to win and for no one to suspect duplicity on our parts.
translation.zh: 直到你能够胜出 也不能让任何人怀疑我们在造假

translation.en: You will post photos of Big Sur,
translation.zh: 你会把去大索尔的照片

translation.en: the truffle french fries at Hoagies Diner on Route 14,
translation.zh: 还有14号公路上 何奇三明治餐厅的松露薯条

translation.en: and cute dogs on your Instagram at least once a day with captions like,
translation.zh: 以及可爱小狗的照片发上Instagram 至少每天发一次 配文要类似于

translation.en: "Wish I was here," and "Yummy," and "heart emoji."
translation.zh: “希望我在”、“美味”、爱心的表情

translation.en: When you do so, I will know you were thinking of me.
translation.zh: 你这么做的时候 我就知道你在想我

translation.en: A secret code. I love it.
translation.zh: 暗号 我喜欢

translation.en: And, most importantly,
translation.zh: 最重要的是

translation.en: when you pass me in the hall, you will not pay me any mind.
translation.zh: 在走廊上碰见我的时候 你不能理会我

translation.en: But as soon as we're past each other, you will turn and look back.
translation.zh: 但当我们擦身而过之后 你就会回头看

translation.en: I need you to do this for me or I won't be able to survive.
translation.zh: 我需要你为我这么做 不然我就没法活了

translation.en: Do you agree to these terms?
translation.zh: 你同意这些条件吗？

translation.en: You are the best thing that will ever happen to me.
translation.zh: 遇上你是我人生中最美好的事

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: I agree.
translation.zh: 我同意

translation.en: Let's move on to fish course.
translation.zh: 那我们继续吃 下一道菜是鱼

translation.en: I don't want to say "I'm overwhelmed with shame."
translation.zh: 我不想说我满面羞惭

translation.en: -That's too calculating, it sounds fake. -It is fake.
translation.zh: -那太有心机了 听起来很假 -真的很假

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: [typing] "I broke up with Payton tonight.
translation.zh: 我今晚跟佩顿分手了

translation.en: I guess you could say I cheated on him, though it's more complicated than that.
translation.zh: 我算是出轨了吧 虽然现实要复杂得多

translation.en: I will not name the other party involved at this time
translation.zh: 我暂且不提另一方当事人的名字

translation.en: out of respect to their family. Period."
translation.zh: 这是出于对其家庭的尊重 句号

translation.en: That's good. Mysterious. Really makes you lean in.
translation.zh: 很好 很神秘 让人感到好奇

translation.en: Post it.
translation.zh: 发布吧

translation.en: -[social media alerts] -This is good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: Jesus, people are freakin' animals. These comments are brutal.
translation.zh: 天哪 现在的人都是禽兽吗？ 评论也太恶毒了

translation.en: -[James] This is really good. -[social media alerts continue]
translation.zh: 这非常好

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨 -嗨

translation.en: I didn't like doing that.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢那么做

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: It's the right thing to do.
translation.zh: 这么做是应该的

translation.en: Hey, Payton. We're ready when you are, buddy.
translation.zh: 嘿 佩顿 我们已经准备好了 就等你了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -♪ I felt the strangest emotion ♪ -[silent mouthing]
translation.zh: 真遗憾

translation.en: [man] Payton.
translation.zh: 佩顿

translation.en: Hey, kiddo.
translation.zh: 嘿 孩子

translation.en: Look, I know you've been struggling with Mandarin and River was tutoring you.
translation.zh: 听着 我知道你中文学得挺吃力 原本里弗在给你补习

translation.en: [sighs] You must be going through a lot right now.
translation.zh: 你现在一定很痛苦

translation.en: Yeah, I am.
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Just show up for the exams, and I'll give you an A.
translation.zh: 你去参加考试就好 我会给你打A的

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 行吗？

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Hey, man, I'm really sorry.
translation.zh: 嘿 哥们 真的很抱歉

translation.en: [whispers] Numbers look great. Genius. Wish I'd thought of it.
translation.zh: 数据棒极了 这招太绝了 要是我能想到这招就好了

translation.en: Go to the cafeteria and press some flesh.
translation.zh: 我去食堂跟大伙儿打打招呼

translation.en: Well, I can imagine.
translation.zh: 哇 我没办法想象

translation.en: Well, well, well. Oh.
translation.zh: 哎哟

translation.en: Look who's home. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 看看是谁回家了

translation.en: Ms. Fancypants, shut the door.
translation.zh: 大小姐 把门关上吧

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: 好的 夫人

translation.en: -Sit down. -Yes, ma'am.
translation.zh: -坐下 -好的 夫人

translation.en: [sighs] This lovely young man was telling me
translation.zh: 这位招人喜欢的年轻人跟我说

translation.en: that you turned him down again as a running mate in the school election.
translation.zh: 你又拒绝了 他请你当学生会竞选搭档的请求

translation.en: That is twice now that you have defied me and I would like an explanation.
translation.zh: 那是你第二次违抗我的命令 我想听听你的解释

translation.en: I just don't want all that attention.
translation.zh: 我就是不想成为众人关注的焦点

translation.en: Oh, don't you lie to me.
translation.zh: 你可别骗我了

translation.en: You were the one who begged me to call the Channel 13 news team
translation.zh: 是你求着我打给第13台的新闻组

translation.en: so you could get a free trip to Legoland.
translation.zh: 就为了能免费去乐高乐园

translation.en: And the second those cameras turned on,
translation.zh: 摄像机开启的那一瞬间

translation.en: well, you just about peed your pants, you were so excited.
translation.zh: 你激动得都快尿出来了

translation.en: You know, actually, Ms. Jackson, uh, Infinity, I have--
translation.zh: 事实上 杰克森夫人 英菲妮蒂 我看过所有关于你的本地新闻

translation.en: I've seen all the local news stories on you and they are...
translation.zh: 英菲妮蒂 我看过所有关于你的本地新闻 那些故事…

translation.en: Oh, God, they're so inspiring.
translation.zh: 天哪 特别鼓舞人心

translation.en: But I really think that this could be something even bigger.
translation.zh: 但我真的觉得这件事更加重大

translation.en: I think this could be a national news story.
translation.zh: 这可能会成为全国新闻

translation.en: Infinity, you could become the voice of a generation of handicapable children.
translation.zh: 英菲妮蒂 你可以成为 这一代残疾孩子的代表人

translation.en: You know, at the risk of sounding vulgar, it's worth remembering
translation.zh: 我说这话可能有点粗俗 你应该要记住 你可以将这个

translation.en: that you could parlay something like that into serious, regular income
translation.zh: 你应该要记住 你可以将这个 变现成一大笔定期收入

translation.en: just off of Instagram alone.
translation.zh: 这还只是在Instagram上

translation.en: Wait a minute.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: -We could make some money on this? -Absolutely. Oh, absolutely.
translation.zh: 我们可以通过这个机会赚钱？ 当然啊

translation.en: Well, hot damn!
translation.zh: 太棒了！

translation.en: [Payton] If it would be at all helpful,
translation.zh: 如果你们觉得有用的话

translation.en: I'd be happy to provide you with a cash loan that could be used for anything.
translation.zh: 我很乐意给你们提供现金贷款 你们可以用这笔钱来做任何事

translation.en: Paying off medical bills, buying a new car.
translation.zh: 支付医疗账单、买新车

translation.en: Wait a minute. A new car?
translation.zh: 等等 新车？

translation.en: -[stammers] Anything. -[laughs] I like the sound of that.
translation.zh: 什么都行！ 我喜欢这个主意

translation.en: You know, I must say, I like the sound of your voice.
translation.zh: 我必须说 我喜欢你的声音

translation.en: Really? Yeah?
translation.zh: 真的吗？是吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I really-- It's got a real melodic tone to it.
translation.zh: 对 真的 你的声调有很动听的旋律

translation.en: Is that-- Are you from the South?
translation.zh: 你是从南部来的吗？

translation.en: Well, I am a country girl.
translation.zh: 这个嘛 我是个乡村女孩

translation.en: I knew it. I knew it.
translation.zh: 我就知道

translation.en: -West-goddamn-Virginia. [chuckles] -Of course.
translation.zh: 还是他妈的西弗吉尼亚 难怪

translation.en: Yeah, I drove all the way to California from Martinsville.
translation.zh: 我从马丁斯维尔 一路开车到了加利福尼亚

translation.en: You ever heard of Martinsville?
translation.zh: 你听说过马丁斯维尔吗？

translation.en: -I don't think I have. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 应该没有

translation.en: -Stop it. Stop it. Just stop it! -What?!
translation.zh: -别说了！快停下来！ -怎么了？

translation.en: [whispers] I know what he's doing.
translation.zh: 我知道他在干什么

translation.en: I know what you're doing.
translation.zh: 我知道你在干什么

translation.en: Payton, you're trying to seduce us.
translation.zh: 佩顿 你想诱惑我们

translation.en: You're using your money and your interest
translation.zh: 你在利用你的钱和兴趣

translation.en: and you're throwing it around like it's nothing.
translation.zh: 你不把这些东西当一回事 随手挥霍

translation.en: Hey, you are being a rude little toad.
translation.zh: 喂 你真是个没礼貌的小怪物

translation.en: He's a fake, Nana. He's a fake. I don't trust anything that he says.
translation.zh: 姥姥 他是个伪君子 他说的话 我一个字都不信

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 太抱歉了

translation.en: -I really do apologize, dear. -No, no, no.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我要向你真诚地道歉 太抱歉了

translation.en: -I am so sorry. -Uh, no, no, she's right.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我要向你真诚地道歉 太抱歉了 不 她说得对

translation.en: She's right.
translation.zh: 她说得对

translation.en: River died and... my girlfriend broke up with me
translation.zh: 里弗死了 我的女朋友和我分手了

translation.en: and I don't think that I've processed any of it.
translation.zh: 我感觉我完全没有缓过劲来

translation.en: Um, I just keep acting like everything is normal.
translation.zh: 我装得好像一切都很正常

translation.en: I just keep going through the motions,
translation.zh: 我继续敷衍度日

translation.en: like nothing happened, but it did, I know that it did.
translation.zh: 好像没事发生 但这些都真的发生了 我知道

translation.en: I know it did, and I still, I can't...
translation.zh: 我知道这些事发生了 我依然没办法…

translation.en: I can't feel anything.
translation.zh: 没办法有任何感受

translation.en: You're right, Infinity. You're right.
translation.zh: 英菲妮蒂 你说得对

translation.en: I'm a fake.
translation.zh: 我就是个伪君子

translation.en: You shouldn't believe anything I say,
translation.zh: 你们不应该相信我说的任何事情

translation.en: because I don't know that I believe it either.
translation.zh: 因为我可能也不信

translation.en: I think that's why I want you for a running mate.
translation.zh: 我想这就是我请你做竞选搭档的原因

translation.en: You're authentic and you're real,
translation.zh: 你很真实、毫无伪装

translation.en: and I can't even face the truth because...
translation.zh: 你很真实、毫无伪装 我甚至都没办法面对真相 因为…

translation.en: because the truth is... [sobs]
translation.zh: 因为真相是…

translation.en: ...the truth is that I loved him.
translation.zh: 真相是我爱过他

translation.en: Oh, my God. I loved him so much. [gasping]
translation.zh: 天哪 我好爱他

translation.en: And now he's gone.
translation.zh: 现在他不在了

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Payton.
translation.zh: 太抱歉了 佩顿

translation.en: I believe you now.
translation.zh: 我现在相信你了

translation.en: [whispers] Hey, I believe you.
translation.zh: 我相信你

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 行吗？

translation.en: We got her.
translation.zh: 搞定她了

translation.en: Because that's what life's all about. It's not about avoiding adversity,
translation.zh: 因为那就是生命的意义 重要的不是躲避逆境

translation.en: it's how we handle the hard times when they come barging into our lives,
translation.zh: 而是当困难从天而降 毁了我们珍视的一切时

translation.en: destroying everything we hold dear.
translation.zh: 我们该如何应对

translation.en: And that's why I've got someone very special with me today.
translation.zh: 所以今天我请来了一位非常特别的人

translation.en: Now, this is a girl that we've all met, but...
translation.zh: 我们都见过这女孩

translation.en: she's someone that I don't think a lot of us really know.
translation.zh: 但我猜了解她的人并不多

translation.en: And I think that the reason that I find her so inspiring
translation.zh: 我想我觉得她特别鼓舞人心的原因

translation.en: is because... I look at my life,
translation.zh: 是因为当我回顾我的生活 和过去几周发生的事情时

translation.en: and what's happened in the past few weeks, even the past few hours,
translation.zh: 是因为当我回顾我的生活 和过去几周发生的事情时 甚至是过去几小时的事情

translation.en: does not even compare to the struggles that this young woman has to face every moment of every day.
translation.zh: 跟这位年轻女士每时每刻 都得面对的挣扎相比 都不足挂齿

translation.en: And yet, she looks at the future...
translation.zh: 但当她望向未来时

translation.en: with hope and optimism
translation.zh: 是带着希望、乐观

translation.en: and a sense of humor.
translation.zh: 还有幽默感

translation.en: Infinity, you inspire me.
translation.zh: 英菲妮蒂 你鼓舞了我

translation.en: That is why I'm proud to introduce you as my running mate today.
translation.zh: 所以我今天要骄傲地宣布 你是我的竞选搭档

translation.en: Ladies and gentleman, the next vice president of Saint Sebastian,
translation.zh: 女士先生们 圣塞巴斯蒂安的 下一位学生会副主席

translation.en: Infinity Jackson!
translation.zh: 英菲妮蒂杰克森

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Oh, my God, that was so nice.
translation.zh: 天哪 你讲得太好了

translation.en: How about this one, huh? Let's hear it.
translation.zh: 怎么样？ 洗耳恭听吧

translation.en: Thank you, my gosh, thank you. Uh...
translation.zh: 谢谢 我的天哪 谢谢

translation.en: I guess Payton's right.
translation.zh: 我想佩顿说得没错

translation.en: My life hasn't always been easy, but my Nana-- my Nana always says,
translation.zh: 我的生活不是一帆风顺 但我姥姥总是说：

translation.en: “Infinity Maybelline Jackson..."
translation.zh: “英菲妮蒂梅宝林杰克森…

translation.en: Congrats on the musical, by the way. Nice to see you.
translation.zh: 对了 恭喜你的音乐剧演出成功 见到你真好

translation.en: Hey, looking good, guys. Thanks for being here.
translation.zh: 嘿 你看起来容光焕发啊 谢谢你过来

translation.en: "...a lot worse than you." And she's right.
translation.zh: …比你更艰难” 她说得对

translation.en: -She already has an 80% approval rating. -And a fan account on Instagram.
translation.zh: 她已经得到了80%的支持率 Instagram上也有了粉丝账户

translation.en: [Infinity] I'm one of the lucky ones.
translation.zh: 我是幸运儿之一

translation.en: Sit back and enjoy the show.
translation.zh: 坐下来 拭目以待吧

translation.en: -But I'm counting my blessings today. -[exhales]
translation.zh: 但我今天已经很知足了

translation.en: We're all lucky, aren't we?
translation.zh: 我们都很幸运 不是吗？

translation.en: -Hey, Andrew. -Eric.
translation.zh: -嘿 安德鲁 -埃里克

translation.en: Right, Eric, sorry.
translation.zh: 对 埃里克 对不起

translation.en: You douchebag, my name is Andrew.
translation.zh: 你这个混蛋 我就叫安德鲁

translation.en: I'm here, I'm alive, I'm with all of you beautiful people.
translation.zh: 我还活在这世上 身边围绕着你们这些美好的人

translation.en: I was coming to find you.
translation.zh: 其实我本来打算来找你

translation.en: I’m really sorry. I want you to know this was a really--
translation.zh: 真的很抱歉 我想让你知道这是非常…

translation.en: She's scamming everyone, you know that, right?
translation.zh: 她在骗所有人 你知道吧？

translation.en: -What? Who? -Infinity.
translation.zh: -什么？谁？ -英菲妮蒂

translation.en: It's all a big scam. She's not sick.
translation.zh: 这就是个大骗局 她没有病

translation.en: Thank you, Payton.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 佩顿

translation.en: Thank you, Saint Sebastian.
translation.zh: 谢谢 圣塞巴斯蒂安

translation.en: She's faking it.
translation.zh: 她是在装病

translation.en: [Infinity] I...
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: [laughs] I’m gonna work my butt off for you guys.
translation.zh: 我会拼命为你们服务

translation.en: I mean, like, let's just get out there and win this thing!
translation.zh: 我想说 努力打赢这场战斗吧！

translation.en: -Yeah! -[cheers and applause]
translation.zh: 没错！
